properties.name: dataloader.batch.size
properties.description: Property to add adjust the batch size for the sql server batch inserts.

properties.name: dataloader.max.requests
properties.description: Property to set number of requests that can be handled concurrently.

properties.name: dataloader.cache.ttl
properties.description: Property to set ttl in minutes.

properties.name: dataloader.cache.cleanup.cron
properties.description: Property to clean up cache at regular intervals in cron format.

properties.name: dataloader.cpu.utilization
properties.description: Property to configure target cpu utilization using thread pools aggresive to lenient e.g. 0.95, 0.80, 0.75.

properties.name: dataloader.cpu.wait.time
properties.description: Property to configure cpu wait time this is used in calculation of thread pool size, this is when we are waiting on I/O activities.

properties.name: dataloader.cpu.process.time
properties.description: Property to configure cpu process time this is used in calculation of thread pool size, this is when cpu is performing a compute task.
